better_bound_box.bound_box

class better_bound_box.bound_box.BoundBox(context, objs: list[bpy.types.Object], apply_transform: bool = True)[source]
__init__(context, objs: list[bpy.types.Object], apply_transform: bool = True)[source]

BoundBox initialization class

Parameters:

  • context (bpy.context) – context of the operator

  • objs (list[bpy.types.Object]) – objects to calculate the bound box

  • apply_transform (bool) – apply transform to the objects before calculating the bound box, it’s optional, but it’s recommended to apply the transform before calculating the bound box

get_center() → tuple[float, float, float][source]

Get center of the object

get_bottom_center() → tuple[float, float, float][source]

Get bottom center of the object

get_hight_vectors() → tuple[tuple[float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float]][source]

Get height min and max vector points

get_width_vectors() → tuple[tuple[float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float]][source]

Get width min and max vector points

get_depth_vectors() → tuple[tuple[float, float, float], tuple[float, float, float]][source]

Get depth min and max vector points

get_real_height(round_value: int = 2) → float[source]

Get real height of the bound box

get_real_width(round_value: int = 2) → float[source]

Get real width of the bound box

get_real_depth(round_value: int = 2) → float[source]

Get real depth of the bound box

get_largest_dimension() → float[source]

Get largest dimension of the bound box (height, width or depth)

get_mean_dimension() → float[source]

Get mean dimension of the object

debug(context) → None[source]

Enable debug mode, when enabled it will display each bound box vector in the viewport as a point

set_origin(context, location: tuple[int, int, int] = (0, 0, 0)) → None[source]

Set origin of the object to the given location, this method is context destructive so it automatically fix the selection and active object after applying the transform

set_location(location: tuple[int, int, int] = (0, 0, 0)) → None[source]

Set location of the object to the given location

scale_to_height(height) → None[source]

Scale object to the given height

scale_to_width(width) → None[source]

Scale object to the given width

scale_to_depth(depth) → None[source]

Scale object to the given depth

class better_bound_box.bound_box.BoundVectors(objs)[source]

Generates all vector min and max values of the objs
